item.title: Unifying Handling of Tomcat and HTTP Error Pages
item.description: In configuration with a front Apache HTTPd 2.2.x server and backend Tomcat servers, you may have defined customs error page on the HTTPd configuration using ErrorDocument directive. ErrorDocument 401 /errors/err-401.html ErrorDocument 403 /errors/err-403.html ErrorDocument 404 /errors/err-404.html ErrorDocument 500 /errors/err-500.html ``` It works well for resources handled by HTTPd but errors for contents served by Tomcat are still handled by Tomcat error mecanism.
